comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1.create new workspace
2.open window/preferences/New CDT project wizard
3.get error message 'the currently displayed page contains invalid values' and error (stack trace below)
4.'New c project' fails (does nothing) with similar stack trace.

This started happenning at some point after changing project settings, and then persisted for all future workspaces. Existing projects work fine.


More information:
eclipse.buildId=I20070608-1718
java.version=1.6.0_01
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_GB
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -clean

I cannot reproduce that on Build id: I20070625-1500

I am encountering this behavior with the exact same reproduction steps:

CDT Build ID: 20070626-1300

Description:

Cannot create new C/C++ projects, existing projects are fine.
This is occurring on all workspaces (both new and previously existing).

Window...Preferences...C/C++...New CDT Project Wizard always displays popup stating "The currently displayed page contains invalid values".
